entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
